Problem E: algorithm-快速幂

### Problem E: algorithm-快速幂

[Creator : ]

Time Limit : 1.000 sec  Memory Limit : 128 MB  
  
[Submit](submitpage.php?cid=1283&pid=4&langmask=2031540)[ProblemList](contest.php?cid=1283)

[Solved: 904](status.php?problem_id=1066&jresult=4)[Submit Num:
2109](status.php?problem_id=1066)[Statistics](problemstatus.php?id=1066)

####  Description

  
  
给定x,求f(x)对100000007取余的结果。![](/upload/image/20221024/20221024064624_31169.jpg)![](data:image/png;ba<x>se64,)![](data:image/png;ba<x>se64,)![](data:image/png;ba<x>se64,)  
![](data:image/png;ba<x>se64,)  

####  Input

多组测试样例，最多50组。每组测试样例给定一个整数x(1<=x<=25000)

####  Output

对每个样例，输出一行，代表f(x)对100000007取余的结果。  
  
  

####  Sample Input
[Copy](javascript:CopyToClipboard\($\('#sampleinput'\).text\(\)\))

    
    
    3
    4
    5

####  Sample Output
[Copy](javascript:CopyToClipboard\($\('#sampleoutput'\).text\(\)\))

    
    
    33
    289
    3414

[Submit](submitpage.php?cid=1283&pid=4&langmask=2031540)
